Select Committee on Small Business
(CREATED PURSUANT TO S. RES. 58, BIST CONGRESS)
April 7, 1967
Dear Mr. Sandler:
I appreciate so much your sending
along to me the material on the National
Educational Radio. This will he most useful
to us in the days ahead.
Should you he in a position to he
of further assistance to us5 we will not
hesitate to call upon you as you have so
kindly suggested.
Sincerely^
Mark 0. Hatfield
United States Senator
Mr. Jerrold Sandler
